channel.description: Recent content in wolframalpha on misctechmusings.com

item.title: Generate QR codes on Wolframalpha
item.description: The computational knowledge engine wolframalpha.com can now generate QR Codes. If you type in “QR Code:" followed by the information (up to 7KB of data) you want encoded a QR Code is generated with the option to change the size, download as a PDF.
